main.name: Andy Read
main.description: Establishing a career in software development after 6+ years in the Ecommerce space as a Digital Product Manager and manager of operations.
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

resume.skillmessage: These skills were either learned during my professional career or during software immersion schooling:

education.description: React, Javascript, and Ruby on Rails software immersion greatly enhanced my technical skills and added recent technologies to my portfolio.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Economics and Bachelors of Arts in History
education.description: Technical degree in economics complete with regression/statistics/math economics and history degree specializing in Central and Eastern Europe
Study term in the Czech republic designed to expand on economic theory in Econometrics and produce undergraduate thesis.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
